co.janicek.core.math.MathCore

type
class

Static Variables

public INT32_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, signed integer.

public INT53_MAX(inline,null) : Float

Biggest whole number. WARNING: INT53_MAX + 1 === INT53_MAX

public INT53_MIN(inline,null) : Float

Smallest whole number. WARNING: INT53_MIN - 1 === INT53_MIN

Static Methods

public average( numbers : Array<Float> ) : Float

public averageInt( numbers : Array<Int> ) : Float

public clamp( value : Float, minOrMax1 : Float, minOrMax2 : Float ) : Float

parameters
value value to clamp
minOrMax1 interval endpoint
minOrMax2 interval endpoint
returns
clamped value to given interval
clamp a Float to an interval interval endpoints are compared to get min and max, so it doesn't matter what order they are passed in

public clampInt( value : Int, minOrMax1 : Int, minOrMax2 : Int ) : Int

parameters
value value to clamp
minOrMax1 interval endpoint
minOrMax2 interval endpoint
returns
clamped value to given interval
clamp an Integer to an interval interval endpoints are compared to get min and max, so it doesn't matter what order they are passed in

public degreesToRadians( degrees : Float ) : Float

public isEven( n : Int ) : Bool

public isOdd( n : Int ) : Bool

public radiansToDegrees( radians : Float ) : Float
